scripts.pages:cleanup: npm run pages:optimize && npm run pages:check

scripts.init-pages: echo 'DEPRECATED: Utilisez npm run pages:init' && npm run pages:init

scripts.setup:dev: npm run pages:check && npm run pages:fix && npm run pages:optimize && npm run pages:status
scripts.maintenance:verify: npm run pages:check && npm run pages:verify && npm run pages:status
scripts.maintenance:optimize: npm run pages:optimize && npm run pages:check

scripts.editor:reset: npm run pages:backup && npm run pages:init && npm run pages:check
